name: Rare Darkness
description: From Rare Dankness Seeds comes Rare Darkness, a cross between the prized genetics of Rare Dankness #1 and the sweet flavor of Grape Ape. The flowers are known for being a deep purple and having a thick coating of trichomes. The flavor is best compared to fresh grapes or berries, and the indica influence will leave you uplifted yet relaxed. Rare Darkness might be just the strain to help you get to sleep at night or to fight off headaches and migraines.

highlightedReviews.text: Bright Dark Purple with tangy after tone sweet vibe smells like sweet grape berries with and earthy background taste is a sweet spicy berry that is pungent every hit leaving you numb and very relaxed specifically in the legs

So me and  my boyfriend tried this tonight. The flavors are amazing as well as the highðŸ˜‰ But I couldnâ€™t stop laughing and talking! It was hilarious!
Had to share ðŸ’‹

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Rare Darkness, Tutankhamon, Quantum Kush, Gemstone, and Tutti Frutti
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week's new strains are in! Whether you're looking to hole up with an indica and watch some Sunday football or planning on aÂ hikeÂ with your favorite sativa, we've got a few recommendations for you. Another round of thanks to all of you who nominated new strains this week, and if you don't see your suggestion here, don't forget to check all the newest varieties in the Leafly Explorer!
Â  Â 1. Rare Darkness
Characteristics of Rare Darkness:

Mostly indica
Cross between Rare Dankness #1 (Ghost OG,Â Chemdawg, andÂ Triangle Kush) and Grape Ape
Breeder: Rare Dankness Seeds
GrapeÂ andÂ berryÂ aroma
UpliftingÂ yetÂ relaxedÂ effects
May help withÂ sleeplessness,Â headaches,Â andÂ migraines

Â  Â 2. Tutankhamon
Characteristics of Tutankhamon:

Mostly sativa
ContainsÂ AK-47Â genetics
Breeder: Pyramid Seeds
Sour,Â skunkyÂ aroma
Social,Â creativeÂ effects

Â  Â 3. Quantum Kush
Characteristics of Quantum Kush:

75/25 sativa-dominant strain
Cross betweenÂ Sweet Irish Kush andÂ Timewreck
Breeder: TGA Genetics
EarthyÂ andÂ sweet
Clear-headed, relaxingÂ effects
May help withÂ appetite loss,Â nausea, orÂ depression

Â Â Â 4. Gemstone
Characteristics of Gemstone:

Hybrid strain
Cross betweenÂ Skunk #1,Â Northern Lights,Â Lavender, andÂ Sour Diesel
FloweryÂ aroma
Deep,Â relaxingÂ effects followed byÂ aÂ euphoric,Â energeticÂ peak
May help withÂ anxietyÂ andÂ pain

Â Â Â 5. Tutti Frutti
Characteristics ofÂ Tutti Frutti:

Autoflowering hybrid
Cross betweenÂ Blue Haze,Â Green Haze,Â Thai
Breeder: Flash Seeds
SweetÂ fruityÂ aroma
Uplifting,Â euphoricÂ effects with a slow onset
